exceptions.exn: In environment this : nid W : world A : Type T1, T2 : prog W A this Unable to unify "@eq (forall _ : proc this W A, Prop) (@set_of W A this T1) (@set_of W A this T2)" with "@eq (prog W A this) T1 T2".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
T2: prog W A this
T1: prog W A this

Goal:
T1 = T2 <-> T1 = T2

Premises:
Record prog (W : world) (A : Type) (this : nid) : Type := Prog { set_of : proc this W A -> Prop; _ : set_of Unfinished } Arguments prog _ _%type_scope Arguments Prog [W] [A]%type_scope [this] _%function_scope
set_of : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (this : nid), prog W A this -> proc this W A -> Prop
Prog : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (this : nid) (set_of : proc this W A -> Prop), set_of Unfinished -> prog W A this
Actions.skip_safe = fun W : world => [eta Coh W] : world -> state -> Prop
injects = Injection.injects : world -> world -> hooks -> Type
hook_complete = fun w : world => hooks_consistent w w : world -> Prop
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
stepAct : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (a : action W A this) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (t : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Act a) sc s2 t < -> (exists (v : A) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), [/\ sc = ActStep, t = Ret v & a_step pf s2 v])
getc = [eta fst] : world -> context getc is a coercion
geth = [eta snd] : world -> hooks geth is a coercion
action = Actions.action : world -> Type -> nid -> Type Arguments action _ _%type_scope
mkWorld = fun p : protocol => (plab p \\-> p, Unit) : protocol -> world
aftI : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : Prop) (Q : A -> state -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> after s p (fun (v : A) (s' : state) => P -> Q v s') < -> (P -> after s p (fun v : A => [eta Q v]))
aftA : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : B -> A -> state -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> after s p (fun (v : A) (s' : state) => forall x : B, P x v s') < -> (forall x : B, after s p (fun v : A => [eta P x v]))
alwI : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : Prop) (Q : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> always s p (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc this W A) => P -> Q s' p') < -> (P -> always s p (fun s' : state => [eta Q s']))
alwA : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : B -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> always s p (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc this W A) => forall x : B, P x s' p') < -> (forall x : B, always s p (fun s' : state => [eta P x s']))
alwI' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : Prop) (Q : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> always_sc s p scs (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc this W A) => P -> Q s' p') < -> (P -> always_sc s p scs (fun s' : state => [eta Q s']))
aft_alwsf : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A), alwsafe s p < -> after s p (fun=> xPredT)
inj_ext : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), Injection.injects U V K -> world
Injection.E : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), Injection.injects U V K -> world
iffLR : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> P -> Q
iffRL : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> Q -> P
alwA' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : B -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop), alwsafe_sc s p scs -> always_sc s p scs (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc this W A) => forall x : B, P x s' p') < -> (forall x : B, always_sc s p scs (fun s' : state => [eta P x s']))
getProtocol = fun (w : world) (i : Label) => match find i w with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt i end : world -> Label -> protocol
stepUnfin : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (t : proc this W A), pstep s1 Unfinished sc s2 t < -> False
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc this W A | Ret : A -> proc this W A | Act : action W A this -> proc this W A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A ->...-> proc this W A Arguments proc _ _ _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this W] [A]%type_scope [V K] Arguments WithInv [this W] [A]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
network_rely = fun (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) => exists n : nat, network_rely' w this n s1 s2 : world -> nid -> state -> state -> Prop
proc_rec : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Set), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_sind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> SProp), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_rect : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Type), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
